name: MEC H2O Lightweight Gloves - Unisex
description: Keep your hands blister-free on warm-weather paddling days. The sturdy synthetic leather protects your palms, and the main fabric is lightweight and breathable so your hands stay cool.Quick-drying polyester mesh backs.Clarino (synthetic leather) palms for excellent paddle feel and great abrasion resistance and blister prevention.Sticky hexagon-patterned silicone on fingers improves grip.Reinforced at high-wear areas like the tops of the palms and inside of thumbs.Velcro® closure.
